name: Validate Manifest
description: Validates manifest.json for Manifest V3 compliance and required fields
prompt:
Check the manifest.json file for:
1. Manifest V3 compliance (manifest_version: 3)
2. Required fields: name, version, description
3. Service worker (not background page)
4. Proper permissions structure
5. Valid content_scripts configuration
6. Valid host_permissions
7. Proper icons configuration
8. Valid content_security_policy

Report any issues found and suggest fixes.
